text:
Aur be reflection? Sab theek? xD. 

Chahe tu meri kitni bhi burayi karle, ekdum same hi hai tu bhi. Kaafi ups and downs aaye apni dosti mai but mai bahut khush hu last din tak saath rahe. 1st year trip se last year trip saath mai karna se ye to saabit ho gaya hai ki apan thore time to jhel sakte hai ek dusre ko xD. 

Agar apan jaldi team up karlete to group dynamics thore aur funny hote. Anyway, chahe Mumbai ho ya Jaipur, apna to milna chalta hi rahega. 

Sar chota karne ka try karle :)
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Hello neta ji, ya Beta gang leader kahu? xD 

Yaar mujhe hamesha se lagta hai ki I have not thanked you enough for elections and everything. Bahut help kari yaar tune and shayad tu na hota toh mai nahi jeet paata. Itna selflessly help karne wala bahut hi kam dost hote hai yaar, Thank you so much for it. 

Baaki stud toh tu hai hi, ye to sabko proof ke saath pata hi hai. Kaafi kuch seekhne ko mila hai yaar tujhse, jitna dedication and hardwork tune dikhaya hai, shayad hi kisi aur ne dikhaya hoga.  

Touch mai rehna. 

Vaise bio bahut accha hai vaise tera xD
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
“Apan ek doosre ke liye bade memoir likh rahe hai kya?” - Perfectly sums up our friendship. Pehle din ke chutiya discussion se start hui ye dosti, aaj tak chutiya discussion hi jhel rahi hai. Bahut hi zyada memories hai inn kuch shabdo mai bayan karne ke liye, isiliye jo yaad aa raha hai likh de raha hu. I know you’ll understand xD 

Kaafi ups and downs rahe hai yaar meri life mai, chahe scenarios and problems badalti rahi ho, tu constant support tha life mai and I feel that I have not thanked you enough for that. I will still not do it because tujhpe aati to mai bhi karta na bro xD. Chahe mere saare elections mai mere saath ghumna ho, meri acads mai jitna ho sake utni help karna ho, meri bandiyo ko RR sunna ho, ya infinite chutiya baate discuss karni ho, you have always been there, Bhatia. I guess ye kehna galat nahi hoga ki apan vo college mai jo best friend dhoondne aaye the, vo dhoond liya tha. However, teri relationship problems beech mai aa jaati hai xD 

Main reason nahi hu teri zindagi mai chutiyappo ka bc, at least 51% share usmain tera hi hai. Chahe jo bhi path apan dono ne choose kiya hai, teri respect to hamesha hi karunga mai bro, aakhir group ka “dependable” banda jo hai tu xD. Yes, I just implied that we have a group. Aakhir last mai jaate jaate ek actual gehrai wala group mil hi gaya. 

Vaise to apan emotional hote nahi hai usually, but ek baar to banta hai I guess. 

Chalo fir, milte rehna? Milenge hi bro, teri shaadi mai to aaunga hi at least. Fir saath mai judge bhi to karenge teri wali ko :) 

Thanks for everything, bro.
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
"Festie banja yaar tu, saath milke chaap denge.". Antaragni mai saath kaam and bitching karne se hi apni bonding hui thi I guess (remember choti?). Hamesha conversations fun rahi bro tere saath. 

Aasha hai ki milte rahenge!
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Hey Anany! 

Apni zyada baat to nahi hui but jab bhi hui tab bahut fun rahi conversations (apart from elections time xD). Also, really thankful to you for agreeing to be my seconder during the elections, man. Kaafi respect karne lag gaya that mai teri after that incident because usse show ho gaya that ki tu ek baar commitment karke peeche hatne wala insaan nahi hai. 

Hope that we meet again. Cheers!
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Apna common topic of discussion toh hamesha hi rahega I guess. You have been a really good friend and I am really grateful to you for taking up all the positions which you need not take. 

Kaash hum thora aur pehle mile hote to shayad aur bhi gehri dosti hoti. Goa mai bhi bada maza aaya tere saath xD. 

Aasha hai ki milte rahenge aage kyuki ab to sirf dosti nahi, rishtedaari ho gayi hai.
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
You have always been a great friend, dude. First year mai saath Chicken khaane se, elections mai tere room mai strategies banane tak, bahut accha safar raha bro. I am sure you will do wonders in whatever you pick up. Also, kabhi truck se bhi saath mai utrenge firse xD. 

Hoping to stay in touch!
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
“Pune mai sirf ek taraf incline hai bro, paani hi nahi bharta hai.” - still being the best reason why Pune is the best. First week se leke kal phone pe baat karne tak, bahut yaadein bana li hai bro apan ne. Mai tujhse sabse pehle impress tab hua tha jab tune baap wing meet mai 5 porn stars ke naam bata diya fatafat and fir tujhe DoPA banaya gaya tha. 
Bahut hi unconventional thinking hai teri bro, from liking Hitler’s ideology to thinking about converting to DD for Gensec. Still, aisi soch ke saath bhi amazingly chappu hai tu. Mad respect for how you lived your journey at IITK, bro. You truly deserve that award.  
I still remember how you conned me into accepting that ITC internship but that honestly turned out to be one of the best decisions of my life (I guess kuch aisi cheezein to maine bhi kari hai tere saath, so we are balanced xD). 
Tere liye bada memoir likhne ki zaroorat nahi hai kyuki Mumbai main milte hi rahenge but still writing it because 20 years down the line jab tu ye yearbook dekhe aur apne marathi bachcho ko padhaye, toh usmai mai bhi aau xD 

It has been a great journey dude, thank you for everything.
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Hey Ameer Insaan!  

Pehle to dil se thank you bolna chahunga for all your help in my elections. Mere manifestos definitely itna acche nahi hote agar tu na hota toh. You have always been a good friend and a great person. First year trip ke time pe train mai chutiya baate discuss karne se last day tak bhi chutiya baate karne tak ka safar accha raha bro. 

Hope karta hu ki life dubara mulakaat zaroor ho.
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Barot bhai, bada maza aaya tere saath DJWAR kara ke yaar. Kaafi accha aadmi, dost and co-manager hai tu bro. 

Aasha hai ki aage bhi milte rahenge bro!
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text: Bahut hi accha aadmi hai yaar tu. Teri stories to hamesha se hi bahut interesting rahi hai and hope karta hu ki aage bhi mulakat hoti rahe and ye stories share hoti rahe.
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text: Bahut late mile yaar apan and I wish tujhse jaldi mulakat ho paati. Kaafi maza aaya tere saath kaam karke bro, I am sure touch mai rahenge aakhir apan “Intellectuals” jo hai xD
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
“Underworld mai thoo thoo kara di yaar tune.” - Ye abhi tak ka one of the best burns hai jo maine suna hai. Kaafi fun and accha aadmi hai bro tu, kaash thora pehle mile hote. 

Koi na, aasha hai ki aage bhi poker khelte khelte Bhatia ke maze lete rahenge.
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
“Tu jab tak peeyega, tab tak mai peeyunga bro.” Aakhir daaru se hi sabse acchi dosti hoti hai. Campus aane ka one of the better highlights apni dosti hi hai bro and ab bas ye gehri hi honi hai Mumbai mai. 

Dhang ki ladkiyo se dosti karna shuru karle bro, end mai kaand shuru ho hi gaye xD. 

“We tight bro, we tight.”
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Mushkil to hai memoir likhna bhai but koi na, try kar lete hai. Pehle din train mai saath aane se aakhri din bus mai saath ghar aane tak ka bada hi suhana safar raha bro. Honestly bataun to mujhe laga nahi tha apan kabhi itne acche dost banenge campus aake, aakhir tu Cambridge Court wala jo tha (xD), par shrishti ka chamatkaar dekho, last mai aate aate apan ek dusre ke top dosto mai aa gaye xD. 

Bahut accha dost, insaan aur bhai hai tu and shayad yehi reason hai ki jo tera dost banta hai vo dil se tujhse attach ho jaata hai. Also, kya pata yehi reason ho teri stud performance ka campus mai? xD. Kabhi kabhi call kar liya kar, utha lunga mai bhi. 

Thanks for everything, Man! Really blessed to have a chutiya like you by my side :)
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Bas ek baar treat leni hai life mai tujhse xD. I still remember jab apan Antaragni mai teri birthday pe mile the tab yehi baat kar rahe the ki apan kitne same hai. Kaafi fun conversations rahi tere saath and hope karta hu ki aage bhi hoti rahe. 

Memes bhejte rehna xD.
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Likh diya jaaye kya? Chalo, likh dete hai. Pehla memoir tere liye hi likh raha so thora structure kharab ho sakta hai, but tujhe kya hi pata chalega, aakhir tu abhi tak ussi level pe to hai. 

Bahut yaadein hai yaar itni si jagah mai likh nahi paunga toh jo yaad aa raha hai vo likh raha hu.  From day1 to the last day, kaafi suhana safar raha bro (poetic because tu pehle kavitayen likhta tha). Mujhe laga nahi tha ki ek 600 rank pe crib karne wala, Kota and Chittor ka launda end tak mera itna amazing dost ban jaayega but thanks to me, bigaad hi diya tujhe :) 
Honestly, presi banne ke equivalent khushi hui thi mujhe jab laga tha tune daru try kar li hai. Aakhir mera and Neil ka ye lifelong dream jo ban gaya tha. Bahut fun hai yaar tu, honestly. Chahe bahar se kitna bhi “maggu” lagta ho. Bas ladki pata leta toh aur modern ho jaata xD 

Chahe first year se leke final year tak exams ka RR karna ho, bandiyo ka RR karna ho (sirf mere end se), Neil se notes maangne ho, random baato be ghanto chutiya discussion karna (chal canteen chalte hai?), and finally, meri political strategy decide karna ho, bahut lamba safar bita liya be apan ne. With 0 ladai and jhagde because end mai tu dil ka itna accha hai ki jhel hi leta hai mujhe xD. Also, kabhi tujhe acche se Thanks nahi bola yaar election ke liye to ab bol deta hu. Tu nahi hota to bahut hi mushkil ho jaata yaar mere liye, itna selflessly help karne ke liye thanks yaar. Meant a lot at that time and still means a lot to me. Isiliye end term mai tera naam sabse pehle hai xD. 

Chalo fir, I am sure kabhi na kabhi milenge apan. Shayad regular touch mai na rahe but jab milenge tab vaise hi milenge jaise abhi hai. 

Thanks dude, for being there all the time. Fir milenge :D
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Mujhe yaad to nahi hai apni dosti kaise shuru hui, but last din tak saath rehne wali kaise ho gayi ye zaroor yaad hai. Bhai, kitni magai kari hai yaar exams ke last din and fir jo gaand fati ke saath exams dene jaate hai apan vo alag. ESO203 ka exam hamesha yaad rahega. 

Kabhi 10 saal baad firse Goa chalenge casino khelne bro, pakka. Tab tak hope karte hai ki poker se hi guzara hota rahe. 

US jaake bhool na jaana, bro. Milte hai...
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Last year main tujh jaisa dost milna one of the best chiz thi meri tenure ki. Kaash pehle mile hote to shayad meri CPI bhi zyada hoti xD. 

Saath mai extensive case prep karna, intense Gymkhana related discussions karna and fir Jay ko saath main pilana, sab chizo mai bahut maza aaya bro.

Dukh rahega ki tu Mumbai nahi aayega 1st year mai but milte hi rahenge apan to. Aakhir Chennai mai kitna hi rahega xD.
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Bahut ki kam tujhse acche dil ke log mile hai campus mai bro. Chahe 1st year mai acads ko leke discussion se final year main daaru ki capacity badhane tak, bahut hi accha saath raha bro tera. Tu hamesha aisa dost raha hai jispe main count kar saku and uske liye bahut dhanyawaad. Gam rahega ki tera sutta na chudwa saka xD 

Ho sake to yaado mai banaye rakhna bro, milte rahenge!
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Thore kam FOMO mai raha kar xD. Final sem mai jitna interaction raha apna kaash pure 4 saal raha hota. Dil se accha bahut aadmi hai yaar tu, also, stud to hai hi? xD. 

First year Galaxy mai fake smoking karna hamesha yaad rahega. Chal, milte rahenge hopefully.
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
1st Year Senators se leke Presi and Chair tak, bahut hi amazing safar raha bro. Chahe apne ideologies kuch chizo mai kitne hi different rahe ho but hamesha ek united front raha apna. Aisa Presi-Chair duo shayad hi mile kabhi? xD Thanks for all the help in Batti though. 

Kya hi memoir likhu, BCG saath hi to jaa rahe hai. Milte hai…
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
Brooo, kaise ho? 2nd year Antaragni ke baad kab itne acche dost ban gaye pata hi nahi chala. I hope tera last day campus mai amazing laga ho tujhe xD 

Honestly speaking, you are one of the most helpful, kindhearted and sincere people I have met on campus. I guess that giving fuck to our career was one of the primary things which helped us bond during 2nd year along with Chicken Tikka Masala xD.

Thank you for introducing me to GH people (both in freshers and later) in the way I wanted you to xD. Keep sharing the information which you know I want to hear (just like you did yesterday <3). 

Also, Thank you so much for the letter, it meant a lot.  


Bharosa hai ki aage bhi logo ko jealous karte rahenge? xD
author: Nikunj  Kothari

text:
“Tu bhi Kothari? Mai bhi Kothari.” - Aakhir bar to bada high set kardiya apan ne. Chahe first year se tujhse bandiyo aur intern ka gyaan lene se, 1 hafte pehle stock market ka gyaan lene tak, tu hamesha hi chaapta raha hai bro. 

Tere saath high ya bhand ya high hona hi reh gaya yaar, kabhi maze karenge saath mai pakka se. I am sure tu life mai bahut bada aadmi banega bro, bhul mat jaana. Also, mai ameer nahi hu (at least abhi to xD).  

Kuch zyada shabd nahi aa rahe hai yaar abhi dhyan mai, but dil main bahut emotions hai. 

Kabhi milenge jab tu India aayega, bas yaad rakhna.
author: Nikunj  Kothari
